parts.content: Who are you? How did you get here?
I guess it doesn't matter now.
Sorry for the late introduction, I am Yusei Fudo.
I'm a Time Runner. Our job is to patrol all of Duel Monsters history and investigate anomolous spikes in Duel Energy.
I was investigating such a spike when I found you.
I don't know how you are related to all of this, but I can tell you aren't the enemy.
You can think of it as a time machine fueled by Duel Energy.
Normally, there would be enough ambient Duel Energy to maneuver history freely. However since you appeared, the Duel Energy seems to have dispersed.
If we want to return to the future, we will have to generate some Duel Energy by dueling.
Oh yeah, I forgot to mention, we are currently in the distant past.
The year is currently 1996, when Duel Monsters first launched as a modern card game.
In fact, I believe this Old Dominoe City, meaning we should be able to meet some friendly faces.
Follow me. The first thing we need to do is build you a deck so that you can help generate Duel Energy.
